title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the set aliases for the columns.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the expression builder. 
2. Select a dataset that has columns with aliases set. 
3. Observe that the old column names are displayed instead of the set aliases.
